tag.name: dropDownItem

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the icon to be used in the menu icon. available list https://fontawesome.com/icons
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Indicates the URL to be used
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates the label key (i18n) to be used
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the target browser. Default: _self. Options: _self, _parent, _blank, namedeumiframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.name: dropDown

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the dropDown direction. Options: left,right,down,up. Default: down
attribute.name: direction

attribute.description: Indicates the size of dropDown. Default none. Options: xl,sm,lg
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: Indicates the dropDown state. Default: default. Options: success, danger, info, default, primary
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used in dropDown root
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates the label key (i18n) to be used in dropDown root
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered
